body:
I'm banned, which means I have to leave Avicus, and probably Minecraft.
Thanks for this awesome year with you guys, that was good because of you! 
Thanks, to all my friends, the staff and everyone <3

MLGtino- Great friend in Teamspeak, we had some great times.

zeus449- A really good friend, we laughed and player over and over, even you banned me, i'm not mad, you did your job. Keep it up!

RagingLumberjack- An awesome friend, helped me a lot here :D

sunrise728- bae <3

Ambi- like zeus. u were my brothers <3

glitchy- Another Eric xd

Teamspeak crew- made  me feel good here, :')

Captain_McPie, MCNerdyGuy: ma crew <3

pizza334- gratz for jr, and u were one of my really good friends here c:

Sorry if I did not list you, there were so many people that made me feel good here! Thanks for this time! I will maybe be active on forums and Teamspeak a bit.

<3

Please, do not lock this post. I know leaving threads are not allowed, but let me thank all the people that made me feel good here.
